sentences.en: Because it was warm, David wore only a white cotton shirt.
sentences.cn: 因为天气暖和，戴维只穿了一件白色的棉衬衣。

sentences.en: Coughs and sneezes spread infections much faster in a warm atmos-phere.
sentences.cn: 在温暖的环境中，咳嗽和喷嚏传播疾病的速度要快得多。

sentences.en: Generally, warm colours advance in painting and cold colours recede.
sentences.cn: 通常，绘画中暖色调为近感色，而冷色调为远感色。

sentences.en: I hope we get some warm weather soon.
sentences.cn: 我希望天气很快就会回暖。

sentences.en: I’ve put your dinner in the oven to keep it warm.
sentences.cn: 我把你的饭菜放进了烤箱里保温。

sentences.en: In a warm-up game for the World Cup, Uruguay have beaten England.
sentences.cn: 在世界杯热身赛中，乌拉圭队打败了英格兰队。

sentences.en: In warm weather, you should wear clothing that is cool and comfortable.
sentences.cn: 在热天里，应该穿凉快舒适的衣服。

sentences.en: Poland provide the opposition for the Scots' last warm-up match at home.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰队在国内最后一场热身赛的对手是波兰队。

sentences.en: Serve the cake warm or at room temperature, cut in squares.
sentences.cn: 等蛋糕温热或凉至室温时切成四方块端上桌。

sentences.en: She snuggled up to him to get warm.
sentences.cn: 她偎依着他来暖和自己的身体。

sentences.en: Spring rains and warm sunlight quickened the earth.
sentences.cn: 春雨和温暖的阳光使大地复苏了。

sentences.en: Thatch is naturally warm in winter and cool in summer.
sentences.cn: 茅草料天生冬暖夏凉。

sentences.en: The children are very tactile with warm, loving natures.
sentences.cn: 小孩子说话时喜欢用上热烈、表达喜爱的肢体触碰。

sentences.en: The fog had lifted and revealed a warm, sunny day.
sentences.cn: 雾已经散了，看来是温暖晴朗的一天。

sentences.en: The house was lovely and warm.
sentences.cn: 那房子漂亮温暖。

sentences.en: They gathered round the fire to warm their hands.
sentences.cn: 他们围坐在炉火边暖手。

sentences.en: They would always come out and warm up the audience.
sentences.cn: 他们总是会出来调动观众情绪。

sentences.en: To keep warm they burnt wood in a rusty oil barrel.
sentences.cn: 他们在一只生锈的油桶里烧木柴来保暖。

sentences.en: Warm milk is the ideal breeding ground for bacteria.
sentences.cn: 温牛奶是细菌理想的滋生地。

sentences.en: warm water
sentences.cn: 温水

sentences.en: Warm weather has attracted the flat fish close to shore.
sentences.cn: 煦暖的气候将比目鱼引到了近海。

sentences.en: We sat round the fire to keep ourselves warm.
sentences.cn: 我们围坐在火边取暖。

words.tran_cn: 取暖器；加热器；加热工人
使…兴奋；使…温暖；使…感兴趣

phrases.tran_cn: [美国俚语]继续谈下去，继续讨论
代人临时占据一个地方或职位
温血；恒温动物；温血动物
（紧张的体力活动后）进行放松
把（已冷的饭、菜）重新加热，使回锅
温暖的天气；温暖的气候

phrases.phrase: wrap up warm (或 be wrapped up warm)

trans.tran_cn: 温暖的，暖和的，保暖的，热心的，友好的，暖色调的
trans.tran_en: slightly hot, especially in a pleasant way
slightly hot, especially in a pleasant way

trans.tran_cn: 使暖和，(对某人)产生好感，(对想法)开始感兴趣
trans.tran_en: to make someone or something warm or warmer, or to become warm or warmer
